text: Majid Nizami () (April 3, 1928 - July 26, 2014), was a Pakistani chief editor and publisher. He worked for Nawa-i-Waqt Group of Publications of Pakistan. Nawa-i-Waqt was founded by Majid's brother, Hameed Nizami. He was also the chairman of Nazaria-i-Pakistan Trust. Nizami died in Lahore, Pakistan from heart disease, aged 86. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Pakistan Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Pakistani writers Category:Publishers
title: Majid Nizami
